title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1388/85 of 24 May 1985 classifying goods under subheading 12.04 A of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1388/85
of 24 May 1985
classifying goods under subheading 12.04 A of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Sliced sugar beet, partly de-sugared, whether or not pelletized either directly by compression or by the addition of a binder (up to 3 % by weight), having a sucrose content (including any sucrose contained in the binder) exceeding 10 % by weight by reference to the dry matter, shall be classified in the Common Customs Tariff under subheading:
12.04 Sugar beet, whole or sliced, fresh, dried or powdered; sugar cane:
A. Sugar beet:

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 May 1985.
For the Commission
COCKFIELD
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 14, 21. 1. 1969, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 191, 16. 7. 1984, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 171, 22. 7. 1968, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 320, 10. 12. 1984, p. 1.
